article.title: BAH Awarded ISR Contract
article.text: Booz Allen Hamilton Inc., McLean, Va., was awarded a $49,916,668 cost-plus-fixed-fee indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for the dematerialization-centric intelligence surveillance and reconnaissance effort to perform analyses, assessments, studies, and operational exercises of technologies and systems. Army Contracting Command, Adelphi, Md., is the contracting activity (W911QX-14-D-0001).
